english_example_sentence: Valuable guests, you will wait ten more minutes in the meeting room.
russian_example_sentence: Уважаемые гости, вы подождете еще десять минут в конференц-зале.
turkish_example_sentence: Değerli misafirler, toplantı salonunda on dakika daha bekleyeceksiniz.
